title: Understanding the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window is a tool in Excel that allows you to monitor changes in specific cells while working on a different part of the worksheet.

title: Locating the Watch Window
text: To access the Watch Window, you need to navigate through the Excel interface. It is typically found under the 'Formulas' tab.

hintAnswer: click "Add Watch" on Watch Window toolbar
title: Adding Cells to the Watch Window
text: Once you have the Watch Window open, you can add cells to it by selecting the cells you want to monitor and then clicking a specific option in the toolbar.
choices: click "Add Watch" on Watch Window toolbar
